CANCELED - May 3, 2025 - Election Information
=============================================

**May 3, 2025 General Election**

* Alderman, Place 2
* Alderman, Place 3
* Alderman, Place 5

[Notice of Deadline to File an Application for a Place on the Ballot](https://www.ferristexas.gov/DocumentCenter/View/418/Notice-of-Deadline-to-File-an-Application-for-a-Place-on-the-Ballot---5325-Election)

Notice of Drawing for a Place on the Ballot

[Ordinance O-25-1024 - Ordering the General Election](https://www.ferristexas.gov/DocumentCenter/View/440/Ordinance-O-25-1024---Ordering-the-General-Election)

[Notice of General Election](https://www.ferristexas.gov/DocumentCenter/View/441/Notice-of-General-Election)

[Internet posting requirement for political subdivisions.](https://www.ferristexas.gov/DocumentCenter/View/419/Internet-Posting-Requirements---Council)

May 2, 2026- A mayor and two (2) Alderman Seats, Place 1 and Place 4.  All seats are at-large and serve a two-year term.







1. [May 2, 2026 - Current Election Information](https://www.ferristexas.gov/328/May-2-2026---Current-Election-Informatio)
2. [Elections and Voter Information](https://www.ferristexas.gov/277/Elections-and-Voter-Information)

4. [Volunteer to Work Elections](https://www.co.ellis.tx.us/335/Poll-Worker-Volunteer-Deputy-Registrar-P)

2. Monday - Thursday 7:30 AM - 5:00 PM
   Monday - Thursday 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM
   **All Other Non-Public Safety Departments**
   Monday - Thursday: 7:30 AM - 5:30 PM

   \*All Non-Public Safety Offices Are Closed Friday through Sunday\*
